DOC.detailed_description: Effect Dapagliflozin 24-hour Blood Glucose 92 Type 2 Diabetes Patients Inadequately Controlled With Either Metformin Or Insulin
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes mellitus ( T2DM ) Treated either stable dose metformin alone > = 1500mg/day stable dose insulin > = 30 units/day 2OAD medication least 8 week Hemoglobin A1c ( HbA1c ) 7.5 % 10.5 % screen Body mass index ( BMI ) < = 45 kg/m2 For patient enter study take stable dose metformin , history take OAD medication metformin 8 week prior screen insulin therapy within 1 year screening For patient enter study take insulin , history take therapy outside stable insulin 2 OAD medication 8 week prior screen . Use sulfonylureas 8 week prior screen Prior exposure dapagliflozin sodiumglucose cotransporter 2 ( SGLT2 ) inhibitor Ingestion medication know affect glucose metabolism > 7 consecutive day 3 month prior Screening Ingestion prescription counter weight loss medication 3 month prior screen
